医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
尿失禁的妇女可以避免侵入性膀胱压力测试持续尿失禁的妇女可以避免侵入性膀胱压力测试，因为新的研究表明，一系列非侵入性评估在指导治疗方面同样有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/uncomfortable-bladder-tests-for-for-for-for-formale-incontinence-can-be-be-be-aver-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/uncomfortable-bladder-tests-for-for-for-for-female-incontinence-can-be-be-be-be-avo-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-say-saspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=895fd1D1D1-BB09-4C1E-874C-BB41AB93B20D Sat, 22 Mar 2025 23:59:00 -0400 Women with urinary incontinence can avoid invasive bladder pressure tests
含水表现出有望治疗副作用较少的扩大前列腺研究的研究发现，使用高压水喷射在扩大的前列腺上进行操作可以更好地保留与标准激光手术相比射精的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/aquablation-shows-promise-promise-formise-foreating-promise-promise-promise-promise-prostate-prostate-with-fewer-fewer-fewer-fewer-fewects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/aquablation-shows-shows-promise-promise-formise-foreating-promise-promise-promise-prostate-prostate-prostate-with-fewer-fewer-fewer-fewects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19CA1289-77A0-4C2D-A184-2F938FBCAC10 Sat, 22 Mar 2025 23:58:00 -0400 Aquablation shows promise for treating enlarged prostate with fewer side effects
儿童肥胖会增加生活中COPD的风险在今年的欧洲肥胖大会（ECO 2025，马拉加，西班牙，5月11日至14日）上进行的新研究表明，在童年时期拥有超重或肥胖的轨迹与成年期间慢性阻塞性肺疾病（COPD）的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/childhood-obesity-obesity-boosts-risks-copd-copd-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/childhood-obesity-obesity-boosts-copd-copd-copd-later-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d85461b4-3feb-480E-8680-0680-0ED28484CE5A Sat, 22 Mar 2025 23:56:00 -0400 Childhood obesity boosts risk of COPD later in life
研究强调了对前囚犯的药物依从性挑战劳拉·达古（Laura Dague）和一组健康研究人员研究了两年的监狱数据数据，注意到一种特殊情况不断出现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/10250322/research-highlights-medication-medication-adherence-adherence-challenges-former-former-prisoners.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/research-highlights-medication-medication-rherence-adherence-challenges-former-former-prisoners.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d42efba-f194-4494-4494-BF5E-9062091D709E Sat, 22 Mar 2025 23:55:00 -0400 Research highlights medication adherence challenges for former prisoners
新研究为非激素子宫内膜异位症治疗铺平了道路世界各地大约有2亿女性患有子宫内膜异位症，这种疾病会导致子宫内壁组织在子宫外的地方生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/new-research-paves-the-way-for-non-hormonal-endomertarosis-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/new-research-paves-the-way-for-non-hormonal-endomertiosis-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=215faf87-5265-42-42-8fd0-fd0-f68d1a351d9d Sat, 22 Mar 2025 23:51:00 -0400 New research paves the way for non-hormonal endometriosis treatments
新的轻度驱动过程可以加速发现新药印第安纳大学和中国武汉大学的研究人员推出了一种开创性的化学过程，该过程可以简化药物化合物的发展，化学构建块，这些构建块影响药物与人体的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/new-light-drive-process-could-accelerate-the-discovery-of-new-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/new-light-drive-process-could-accelerate-the-discovery-of-new-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=BBCAA569-C9FC-4C28-A40F-681ECFE10C18 Sat, 22 Mar 2025 23:50:00 -0400 New light-driven process could accelerate the discovery of new drugs
新的单克隆抗体在治疗粘膜菌病方面有希望粘膜细胞增多是由粘膜引起的一种真菌感染，免疫系统疲软的人以及患有严重创伤的人（如烧伤，爆炸损伤或自然灾害的受害者）的死亡率很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/new-monoclonal-antibody-shows-shows-promise-in-warteating-mucormycosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/new-monoclonal-antibody-shost-promise-promise-in-warteating-mucormycosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02E8F53F-F38C-466F-A72A-539399979E77A Sat, 22 Mar 2025 23:47:00 -0400 New monoclonal antibody shows promise in treating mucormycosis
Asgard古细菌为复杂生命形式的起源提供了线索十年前，没有人知道Asgard古细菌甚至存在。然而，在2015年，研究人员研究了深海沉积物发现的基因片段，这些基因片段表明了一种新的且未被发现的微生物形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/asgard-Archaea-provide-clues-clues-to-the-complex-complex-life-forms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/asgard-archaea-provide-clues-clues-clues-to-the-origin-of-complex-complex-life-forms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=812A38DA-F8F1-4794-847D-01419CEAB810 Sat, 22 Mar 2025 23:45:00 -0400 Asgard archaea provide clues to the origin of complex life forms

研究揭示了Treg细胞在预防自身免疫反应中的关键作用在感染过程中，免疫系统需要区分通过细菌和病毒与人体细胞表达的自我抗原表达的外国抗原。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/study-reveals-key-reveals-key-role-of-treg-cells-cells-in-priventing-autoimmune-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/20250322/study-reveals-key-reveals-key-ole-of-treg-cells-cells-in-preventing-automune-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db1efe83-fa09-4e7e-9bd1-20274558506c Sat, 22 Mar 2025 23:33:04 -0400 Study reveals key role of Treg cells in preventing autoimmune responses
